amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enforce the Fair Housing Act in a manner that relies upon an allegation of liability under section 100.500 of title 24, Code of Federal Regulations (disparate impact).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enforce the Fair Housing Act in a manner that relies upon an allegation of liability under section 100.500 of title 24, Code of Federal Regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A069) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 196 (Roll no. 287).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A069) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 196 (Roll no. 287).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A069) offered by Mr. Garrett.
